definitions.body: one side Da 7:5; n. om. Da 6:3; [[חֲדָה]] Da 2:9 = one and invariable (inevitable) ; [[כַּחֲדָה]] v:Da 2:35 as one, altogether (so S-C:K 3 Targum, and late BH [[כְּאֶחָד]] Ezr 2:64 +); = ordinal, [[שְׁנַת חֲדָה]] first year Ezr 7:1, Ezr 5:13, Ezr 6:3; ´[[ח]]: = a certain one (tina\) Da 7:16 (c. [[מִן]] partit.).
a (indef. art.) c. subst. Da 2:31, Da 6:18, Da 4:16 (v. [[שָׁעָה]]), Ezr 4:8, Ezr 6:2, [[חַד שִׁדְעָךְ]] Da 3:19 = seven-fold (as Syr.: Nö:§ 241 PS 1194; cf. Ex 16:5 Syrver), v. K:§ 66, 2.
